text: Hagi kefo zamavu'zamava zama nehaza vahe'mo'za ana zama nege'za, zamarimpagu nehu'za zamavera aninkreki hugahaze. Ana nehu'za kefo avu'ava zama nehaza vahe'mo'zama knare'nare zama erinaku'ma antahintahima hu'nesaza zana e'orisageno, mago'a zama erinaku'ma amuhama nehaza zamo'a amne zankna hugahie.
